channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CDC recommends parents talk to a doctor about getting COVID-19 shots for kids
item.description: RFK Jr. announced this week that the federal government is removing the recommendation that kids and pregnant women get routine COVID-19 vaccines. But...

item.title: Trump celebrates Musk as he departs "special government employee" post with DOGE
item.description: President Trump took questions from the Oval Office after lauding entrepreneur Elon Musk on his last day of work with the White House. Musk worked for...

item.title: How Bondi mass killer slipped through the cracks in Australia
item.description: An inquest is examining whether there were "missed opportunities" to stop Joel Cauchi's stabbing rampage.

item.title: 5/30: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: What mixed signals on the economy are saying; Reporter's Notebook: Words of wisdom from college graduation speeches

item.title: Shakira cancels second concert over production issues
item.description: The Colombian pop star says she is "devastated", after also cancelling her previous show in Boston.

item.title: Warning after 250 million bees escape overturned truck in US
item.description: Master bee-keepers are called to the scene after a truck containing 70,000 pounds of active honey bee hives flipped over.

item.title: 2 injured in shooting on University of Minnesota campus, police say
item.description: The shooting occurred at about 8:20 p.m. outside the 3M Arena at Mariucci following a high school graduation ceremony, police said.

item.title: US to double tariffs on steel and aluminium imports to 50%, Trump says
item.description: President Donald Trump says the increase in tariffs will protect America's steel industry, along with an expected partnership with Japan.

item.title: Trump says he's doubling steel tariffs to 50%
item.description: President Trump announced Friday he'll double steel tariffs from 25% to 50% during a visit at a U.S. Steel mill in the Pittsburgh area.

item.title: Ukraine accuses Russia of undermining next round of peace talks
item.description: Russia says it is sending its negotiators to Turkey for a second round of ceasefire talks on 2 June.

item.title: Trump fires director of the Smithsonian's National Portrait Gallery

item.title: Food for Gaza decays in Jordan warehouses as Israel restricts aid

item.title: Remembering a Ballet Legend in Russia; a Monkey Census in Nepal

item.title: PBS and Minnesota public TV station sue Trump White House

item.title: Ultramarathon runner breastfeeds her baby 3 times on her way to a surprise win
item.description: The extreme sport of ultrarunning is known for seemingly impossible feats. But Stephanie Case's recent performance — six months after giving birth — i...

item.title: The US academic partnership with China, under strain for years, faces its biggest threat

item.title: Faizan Zaki overcomes a shocking, self-inflicted flub and wins the Scripps National Spelling Bee
Trump administration increases pressure on ‘sanctuary jurisdictions’ with public listing
